com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl

Class ByteBufferLongsSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment<S>
      • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.SegmentBase<LongsSegment>
        • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.LongsSegment
          • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl.ByteBufferLongsSegment

  • public class ByteBufferLongsSegment
extends LongsSegment
    Segment implementation that uses LongBuffers for storing data. Basically a wrapper around (direct) LongBuffer, adding state information and linkage to next segment in chain (of used or free segments).
    Author:
    Tatu Saloranta

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ByteBufferLongsSegment.Allocator
      SegmentAllocator implementation that allocates ByteBufferLongsSegments.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment

        Segment.State

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected LongBuffer _buffer
      Underlying low-level buffer in which raw entry data is queued
      protected LongBuffer _readBuffer
      Wrapper buffer used for reading previously written content; wrapper used to allow separate pointers for reading and writing content.

      • Fields inherited from class com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.SegmentBase

        _nextSegment, _state, ABSOLUTE_MINIMUM_LENGTH

      • initForReading

        public LongsSegment initForReading()
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Method called when the segment becomes the active read segment. Its state may or may not change, but we do need to create the reader-wrapper for ByteBuffer

      • readLength

        public int readLength()
        Method for reading as much of the length prefix as possible from the current pointer in this segment. This will be from 0 to 5 bytes, depending on length of prefix, and whether it resides completely in this segment or not.
        Specified by:
        readLength in class LongsSegment
